fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Watchful: Learn 3 non-King playerâ€™s names. 2 of them will truly win with each other, while the 3rd may or may not win with either of them. [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Observe: Learn a random attacking card played by Chaos this phase at the end of the phase. Influenceable. [2 uses, 2 CD, Day-Only, Unlocks D2] 
- Tapwire: Choose a player. Find out if they used an ability this phase, and who it targeted at the end of the phase. [2 use, 2 CD] 
- Pry: Choose a player. Find out if they played an attacking card this phase at the end of the phase. [2 uses]
- Scavenge: Gain a non-special item card of your choice. Gain a use for every 3 players you outlive. [2 uses, 2 CD, Recharging, 0/3]
